quest.name: 对战1
quest.short: SPACESHIP:10 minutes Fight a duel without changing player levels and parameters.
quest.long:
[Most kills wins] Use the walls to ambush your opponents.
Teams will be assigned automatically when 4 players join.

quest.name: 对战2
quest.short: PALACE:10 minutes All players' levels will revert to Level 1.
quest.long: [Most kills wins] Item boxes appear on the field. Be careful, if you are killed, you lose points.

quest.name: 对战3
quest.short: SPACESHIP:10 minutes Warp Battle All players' levels are equal, so use warps to win this battle.
quest.long: [WARP battle] Use the warps to get behind your rivals.

quest.name: 对战4
quest.short: PALACE:10 minutes Meseta Battle All levels are equal, so use the map to find Meseta.
quest.long: [Meseta Battle] Get the highest amount of Meseta to win. Kill other players before they get Meseta.

quest.name: 对战5
quest.short: PALACE:10 minutes Meseta battle There are no revivals and no level limits.
quest.long: [Meseta Battle] Bring plenty of health items and equip healing spells. Get the highest amount of Meseta to win. Notice : Mag is unusable. Teams will be assigned automatically when 4 players join.

quest.name: 对战6
quest.short: SPACESHIP:10 minutes Battle it out and shoot at each other from behind walls.
quest.long:
[Most kills wins] Use the walls to ambush your opponents.
Teams will be assigned automatically when 4 players join.

quest.name: 对战7
quest.long:
[Obstacle Race]
Avoid obstacles Get Meseta Avoid enemies 15 lives

quest.name: 对战8
quest.short: SPACESHIP:10 minutes Battle it out through trap hell.
quest.long:
[Trap Hell]
Watch out for random traps!

quest.name: 白色日
quest.short: $C6让我们制作一束鲜花作为白色日的礼物！
quest.long: 询问瑙拉姐妹花在哪里盛开，并为白色的一天制作一束鲜花!

quest.name: 决战双六
quest.short: 狩猎: 击败所有怪物!
quest.long: 雇主: 总督 任务要求: Defeat as many enemies as you can in the simulator within the time limit. 奖励: ??? 美赛塔

quest.name: AOL CUP -Maximum Attack-
quest.short: 狩猎: 击败所有怪物!
quest.long: 雇主: 总督 任务要求: Defeat as many enemies as you can in the simulator within the time limit. 奖励: ??? 美赛塔

quest.name: AOL CUP -夕阳下的秘密基地-
quest.short: Get to the bottom of this strange request!
quest.long:
雇主: Rapeel 任务要求: A strange request has arrived via mail. It seems that somebody desperately needs help.
奖励: ??? 美赛塔

quest.name: Maximum Attack 4th Stage -A-
quest.short: 梦幻之星 蓝色脉冲 3周年纪念任务. Play three battlefields again Rescue the crisis of the lagoon!
quest.long: 雇主: joint measures headquarters 任务要求: The mysterious photon concentration rose sharply. A large number of living things were found in lagools. I want you to take control of hunters. 奖励: ??? 美赛塔

quest.name: Maximum Attack 4th Stage -B-
quest.short: 梦幻之星 蓝色脉冲 3周年纪念任务. Play three battlefields again Rescue the crisis of the lagoon!
quest.long: 雇主: joint measures headquarters 任务要求: The mysterious photon concentration rose sharply. A large number of living things were found in lagools. I want you to take control of hunters. 奖励: ??? 美赛塔

quest.name: Maximum Attack 4th Stage -C-
quest.short: 梦幻之星 蓝色脉冲 3周年纪念任务. Play three battlefields again Rescue the crisis of the lagoon!
quest.long: 雇主: joint measures headquarters 任务要求: The mysterious photon concentration rose sharply. A large number of living things were found in lagools. I want you to take control of hunters. 奖励: ??? 美赛塔

quest.name: 总督的礼物
quest.short: On the other hand The governor made up A new VR program. What's that?
quest.long: Chief: Governor General 任务要求: It is called 'howaya.' A new VR program was produced. Enhance hunters' bonds I want you to experience it by all means. 奖励: 300 minutes ※ this quest is for two players only.

quest.name: 梦之使者
quest.short: Help a boy's mysterious dream come true.
quest.long: 雇主: 一位父亲 任务要求: My son insists on going down to Ragol, and won't take no for an answer. Go to Ragol and find out what my son is looking for. 奖励: ??? 美赛塔

quest.name: 先驱者号万圣节
quest.short: Find some legendary cake to hand out to the children!
quest.long: 雇主: Young woman 任务要求: I need you to get me the best cake in the universe! But the 3 Naura Sisters are somewhere on Gal Da Val Island! 奖励: ???

quest.name: Maximum Attack 2
quest.short: Use teamwork to defeat the enemies.
quest.long: 雇主: 总督 任务要求: Work together with other hunters to obliterate the enemies to achieve your goal under a time limit. 奖励: ???

quest.name: 若在海边微笑 (Ver ?)
quest.long:
雇主: ???
任务要求: Give life to the rappies!

quest.name: 在海边唱跳RAP
quest.long:
雇主: ??? 任务要求: Rappies are throwing a party! Please come join us!
奖励: ???

quest.name: 海滨的庆典
quest.long: The Lab is closed for the night...

quest.name: 若在海边微笑
quest.long:
雇主: ???
任务要求: Give life to the rappies!

quest.name: 先驱者号圣诞节
quest.short: Please deliver the cake wrapping paper to the cake shop.
quest.long: 雇主: Naura sisters 任务要求: I came to purchase cake wrapping paper for the Christmas cake, but I'm caught up in some busywork. Can you deliver it to my sisters? 奖励: 500 美赛塔

quest.short: 梦幻之星 蓝色脉冲 3周年纪念任务. Play three battlefields again Rescue the crisis of the lagoon!
quest.long: 雇主: joint measures headquarters 任务要求: The mysterious photon concentration rose sharply. A large number of living things were found in lagools. I want you to take control of hunters. 奖励: ??? 美赛塔

quest.name: 深邃的蓝底（讨伐4000万）
quest.short: -MA4特设会场- 深邃的蓝底（讨伐4000万） Lost in lagol I met the battle Hunters on Fate to wait for!
quest.long: 雇主: joint measures headquarters 任务要求: Hunters in action Prepare supplies for you Yes. Please make use of it. 40,000,000 kills Congratulations!

quest.name: 深邃的蓝底（讨伐8000万）
quest.short: -MA4特设会场- 深邃的蓝底（讨伐8000万） Lost in lagol I met the battle Hunters on Fate to wait for!
quest.long: 雇主: joint measures headquarters 任务要求: Hunters in action Prepare supplies for you Yes. Please make use of it. 80,000,000 kills Congratulations!

quest.name: 深邃的蓝底（讨伐1亿）
quest.short: -MA4特设会场- 深邃的蓝底（讨伐1亿） Lost in lagol I met the battle Hunters on Fate to wait for!
quest.long: 雇主: joint measures headquarters 任务要求: Hunters in action Prepare supplies for you Yes. Please make use of it. 100,000,000 kills Congratulations!

quest.name: 深邃的蓝底（讨伐4000万, 测试）
quest.short: -MA4特设会场- 深邃的蓝底（讨伐4000万, 测试） Lost in lagol I met the battle Hunters on Fate to wait for!
quest.long: 雇主: joint measures headquarters 任务要求: Hunters in action Prepare supplies for you Yes. Please make use of it. 40,000,000 kills Congratulations!

quest.name: 深邃的蓝底（讨伐8000万, 测试）
quest.short: -MA4特设会场- 深邃的蓝底（讨伐8000万, 测试） Lost in lagol I met the battle Hunters on Fate to wait for!
quest.long: 雇主: joint measures headquarters 任务要求: Hunters in action Prepare supplies for you Yes. Please make use of it. 80,000,000 kills Congratulations!

quest.short: -MA4特设会场- 深邃的蓝底（讨伐1亿, 测试） Lost in lagol I met the battle Hunters on Fate to wait for!
quest.long: 雇主: joint measures headquarters 任务要求: Hunters in action Prepare supplies for you Yes. Please make use of it. 100,000,000 kills Congratulations!

quest.name: LOGiN presents 勇場のマッチレース
扫荡作战 第一号
quest.short: 任务简介: Sweep monsters from forest.
quest.long: 雇主: lieutenant 任务要求: I want the monsters in the forest around the Central Dome to be swept away. 奖励: ??? 美赛塔

quest.name: 扫荡作战 第二号
quest.short: 任务简介: Sweep monsters from caves.
quest.long: 雇主: lieutenant 任务要求: I want the monsters in the underground caves to be swept away. 奖励: ??? 美赛塔 *This quest requires at least 2 players.

quest.name: 扫荡作战 第三号
quest.short: 任务简介: Sweep machines in the mines.
quest.long: 雇主: lieutenant 任务要求: I want the machines in the mines underground to be swept out. 奖励: ??? 美赛塔

quest.name: 扫荡作战 第四号
quest.short: 任务简介: Sweep monsters from the ruins.
quest.long: 雇主: lieutenant 任务要求: I want the monsters in the ruins underground to be swept out. 奖励: ??? 美赛塔

quest.name: 无尽的恶梦 1
quest.short: Exterminate all monsters in the forest on Ragol.
quest.long: 雇主: 军人 任务要求: Monsters seem to be constantly regenerating in one area of the forest. Exterminate them. 奖励: ??? 美赛塔

quest.name: 无尽的恶梦 2
quest.short: 任务简介: Exterminate all monsters in a cave on Ragol.
quest.long: 雇主: 军人 任务要求: Monsters seem to be constantly regenerating in one area of the caves. Exterminate them. 奖励: ??? 美赛塔

quest.name: 无尽的恶梦 3
quest.short: Exterminate all monsters in the mines on Ragol.
quest.long: 雇主: 军人 任务要求: Monsters seem to be constantly regenerating in one area of the mines. Exterminate them. 奖励: ??? 美赛塔

quest.name: 无尽的恶梦 4
quest.short: Exterminate all monsters in the ruins on Ragol.
quest.long: 雇主: 军人 任务要求: Monsters seem to be constantly regenerating in one area of the ruins. Exterminate them. 奖励: ??? 美赛塔 * This quest requires at least 2 players.

quest.name: 明日的代价
quest.short: Infiltrate the depths of the laboratory and delete the research data!
quest.long: 雇主: A spy who infiltrated the lab 任务要求: Prevent the disclosure of the research to the outside world! Destroy the host computer to prevent the disclosure! 奖励: ??? 美赛塔

quest.name: 1-1:行星拉古奥尔
quest.short: $E$CGGo down to Ragol's surface and report on the conditions there.
quest.long: 雇主: 总督 任务要求: We need expert hunters like yourself to explore and gather data from Ragol's surface. ※ Job can be joined while in progress.

quest.name: 1-2:多雨的森林
quest.short: Eliminate the hostile animals prowling around the Central Dome area!
quest.long: 雇主: 总督 任务要求: Please eliminate the dangerous wildlife in the area around the Central Dome.

quest.name: 1-3:地下巢穴
quest.short: Nobody has come back from beneath the Central Dome alive...
quest.long: 雇主: 总督 任务要求: Nobody that we've sent beneath the Central Dome has come back alive. Please go down and investigate. ※ Job can be joined while in progress.

quest.name: 2-1:灼热的洞窟
quest.short: A cave has been found beneath Ragol. Go and investigate.
quest.long: 雇主: 总督 任务要求: A network of subterranean caverns has been found under the surface of Ragol. Please investigate. ※ Job can be joined while in progress.

quest.name: 2-2:地底深处
quest.short: A bizarre monument, has been found within the caverns...
quest.long: 雇主: 总督 任务要求: Please get some data readings on the strange monument discovered in the caverns. ※ Job can be joined while in progress.

quest.name: 2-3:突然变异体
quest.short: Gather data on the creatures that live underground.
quest.long: 雇主: 总督 任务要求: We have no data on the creatures living in the caves. Please go and take some data readings on them.

quest.name: 2-4:水中潜影
quest.short: Mysterious "thing" seen in the underground waterway.
quest.long: 雇主: 总督 任务要求: Make your way to the underground waterway in the caverns. ※ Job can be joined while in progress.

quest.name: 3-1:地下施设
quest.short: Why is there a large-scale facility underneath Ragol?
quest.long: 雇主: 总督 任务要求: Please investigate the strange, large-scale facility that was discovered beneath Ragol's surface. ※ Job can be joined while in progress.

quest.name: 3-2:发动袭击的机器
quest.short: Annihilate the machines that are down in the mines!
quest.long: 雇主: 总督 任务要求: Annihilate the machines that have begun attacking everything in the underground mine area.

quest.name: 3-3:中央管理室 (CS)
quest.short: Find the control room to the underground facility!
quest.long: 雇主: 总督 任务要求: There must be some sort of central control room to the underground facility. Try to find it. ※ Job can be joined while in progress.

quest.name: 4-1:长眠地下的遗迹
quest.short: Break the seal to the ruins and get inside!
quest.long: 雇主: 总督 任务要求: We believe that we have found ruins under the surface of Ragol. The entrance is sealed, however. Please try to find a way inside in order to investigate.

quest.name: 4-2:地底石碑
quest.short: Get data on the writing from the stone monument in the ruins!
quest.long: 雇主: 总督 任务要求: Please take some data of the writing on the stone relics in the ruins.

quest.name: 4-3:英雄儿女
quest.short: A secret request from the Principal. What could he want?
quest.long: 雇主: 总督 任务要求: Details pending. ※ Job can be joined while in progress.

quest.name: 4-4:骚动的坟墓
quest.short: Exterminate the enemies and secure a path through the ruins!
quest.long: 雇主: 总督 任务要求: Exterminate the strange life forms in the ruins, and secure a path to the bottom. ※ Job can be joined while in progress.

quest.name: 4-5:暗之遗产
quest.short: Get to the bottom of the ruins! The answers must lie there!
quest.long: 雇主: 总督 任务要求: Whatever is down in those sealed ruins is what brings this all together... ※ Job can be joined while in progress.

quest.name: 5-1: 资格测试1 虚拟神殿1
5-2: 资格测试2 虚拟神殿2
5-3: 资格测试3 虚拟神殿3
5-4: 资格测试4 虚拟神殿4
5-5: 资格测试5 虚拟神殿5
6-1: 资格测试6 虚拟宇宙船1
6-2: 资格测试7 虚拟宇宙船2
6-3: 资格测试8 虚拟宇宙船3
6-4: 资格测试9 虚拟宇宙船4
6-5: 资格测试10 虚拟宇宙船5
消失的沙槌
quest.short: Get out there and find the missing maracas!
quest.long: 雇主: Memory Hunter 任务要求: Search for the missing maracas to regain lost memories. 奖励: ??? 美赛塔

quest.name: 被夺走的高热大剑
quest.short: Retrieve a weapon from a Dragon!
quest.long: 雇主: Hopkins, hunter 任务要求: My weapon was taken from me when I was fighting a Dragon. 奖励: ??? 美赛塔

quest.name: 被夺走的冰晶投刃
quest.short: Retrieve a weapon from a De Rol Le!!
quest.long: 雇主: Hopkins, hunter 任务要求: My weapon was taken from me when I was fighting a De Rol Le. 奖励: ??? 美赛塔 *This quest requires at least 2 players.

quest.name: 被夺走的魂之匕首
quest.short: Retrieve a weapon from a Vol Opt!!!
quest.long: 雇主: Hopkins, hunter 任务要求: My weapon was taken from me when I was fighting a Vol Opt. 奖励: ??? 美赛塔

quest.name: 记忆的碎片
quest.short: The search for message capsules left in the Ruins.
quest.long: 雇主: Military 任务要求: Pioneer 1 may have left message capsules in the Underground Ruins on Ragol. I want you to look for them. 奖励: ??? 美赛塔

quest.name: 被夺走的地狱荣耀光剑
quest.short: Will this be the final request from Hopkins? Retrieve a weapon from an enemy!!!!
quest.long: 雇主: Hopkins, Force 任务要求: My weapon was taken from me when I was fighting in the Ruins. I want to get it back! 奖励: ??? 美赛塔

quest.name: 拉比的假日
quest.long: The Rappies are having a festival. Participate and get excited.

quest.name: 加隆的野心
quest.short: "Shoot a movie on the surface of Ragol" What are Gallon's expectations?
quest.long: 雇主: Gallon Details: Partake in a movie! Apply now for lead roles! Active duty hunters welcome. Need 2 to 4 roles. 奖励: ??? 美赛塔 * This quest requires at least 2 players.

quest.name: 迎向未来
quest.long: 雇主: 总督 任务要求: Wishes to have hunters challenge the new simulator. 奖励: ??? 美赛塔

quest.name: Labyrinthine Trial
quest.short: Build a strong bond with your teammates using the Principal's simulation!
quest.long: 雇主: Irene 任务要求: A combat simulation has been prepared to help you build your team skills. * This quest requires more than one player. 奖励: 0 美赛塔

quest.name: MAXIMUM ATTACK 1 Ver2
quest.short: Use teamwork to defeat the enemies.
quest.long: 雇主: Man in highfaluting clothes. 任务要求: All hunters must cooperate to keep destroying enemies in the simulator to save specific points.

quest.name: 加隆的商店(情人节活动)
电玩通 杯 v2 (v1)
quest.short: Hunters ranking Challenge! Kyoso Corporation Enter brain Corporation E access
quest.long: Lord? Man in an agate clothes 任务要求: We want to determine hunters' ranking, so please clear our issue.

quest.name: 小叮当的狗 2
quest.short: Find a pet that ran away!
quest.long: 雇主: Neighborhood child 任务要求: A pet that was kept in secret ran away. Owner wants it brought home. 奖励: ??? 美赛塔.

quest.name: 情人节活动
quest.short: 单身特别任务. 仅限女性.
quest.long: Borrow utensils from patisserie sisters and let's make a handmade chocolate.

quest.name: 祝你好运!
quest.long: 雇主:? 任务要求: 新年快乐! Are you a lucky Casino As an honorary visitor Hunters were chosen from inside! 这辈子只有一次机会!

quest.name: 加隆的计划
quest.short: What's this "thing" you can obtain in the forests of Ragol?
quest.long: Client: Gallon Information: I want you to go down on Ragol and bring me a certain thing that can be found in the forest. Reward: 500 Meseta

quest.name: 钢之心
quest.short: A valuable commodity on Ragol was lost?!
quest.long: Client: Garon, trader Quest: Retrieve items that were stolen on a trip back from Ragol. Reward: 500 Meseta

quest.name: 中心圆顶的火灾(在线版本)(V2)
